curam.util.security
Interface ExternalAccessSecurity

public interface ExternalAccessSecurity

Interface for implementing external access security.

Field Summary

          A constant for the internal user identifier.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

authenticateUser

java.lang.String authenticateUser(java.lang.String identifier,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String userType)
                                  throws AppException,
                                         InformationalException
The implementation of this method should validate the identifier and password and return the result of the validation. If the information is valid, the codetable code SecurityStatus.LOGIN should be returned.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
password - The encrypted password.
userType - The type of external user.
Returns:
The status of the authentication in the form of a codetable code.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getLoginDetails

UserLoginDetails getLoginDetails(java.lang.String identifier)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
The implementation of this method should retrieve the details of the user required to redirect them to the correct application page. This information includes the name of the application home page for the user, the default locale for the user and a list of warnings/messages for the user.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
Returns:
The user details, including the application home page.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getSecurityRole

java.lang.String getSecurityRole(java.lang.String identifier)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
The implementation of this method should return the security role associated with the external user for authorization purposes. If the user does not exist null should be returned.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
Returns:
The security role for authorization.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getUserType

java.lang.String getUserType(java.lang.String identifier)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Return the type of the user. This is to allow support for different types of external user. If there is only one external user, simply return "EXTERNAL".

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
Returns:
The type of the external user.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getRoleUsageCount

int getRoleUsageCount(java.lang.String role)
                      throws AppException,
                             InformationalException
Return the number of users using a particular role. This method is used to ensure that a role cannot be deleted when it is in use by an external user.

Parameters:
role - The security role name.
Returns:
The number of users currently using the specified role.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getRegisteredUserName

java.lang.String getRegisteredUserName(java.lang.String identifier)
                                       throws AppException,
                                              InformationalException
Gets the correct casing for this user independent of mixed case which may have been typed in by the logged in user.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user, whose casing may not match that of the persisted identifier for the user.
Returns:
The actual case for this user, before its case has been modified by external factors.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getUserPreferenceSetID

java.lang.String getUserPreferenceSetID(java.lang.String identifier)
                                        throws AppException,
                                               InformationalException
This method is used to retrieve a set of user preferences associated with an external user. The userPrefSetID is a foreign key to the UserPreferenceInfo table. The UserPreferenceInfo table contains information on the user preferences.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
Returns:
The userPrefSetID for the external user.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyUserPreferenceSetID

void modifyUserPreferenceSetID(java.lang.String userPreferenceSetID,
                               java.lang.String username)
                               throws AppException,
                                      InformationalException
This method updates the external user details with new user preferences.

Parameters:
userPreferenceSetID - The ID for the user preferences.
username - The identifier of the external user.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
